Game.Name: ESPN Great Outdoor Games - Bass Tournament (Europe)
Game.plot: Pull on your waders, bait your fishing rod and gear up for the most reel-istic portable fishing game of all time! You'll play through 3 game modes, including Great Outdoor Games Tournament, Free Fishing Mode and Vs. Mode. Choose one of 7 locations, climb into your boat and see if you have the skills to catch the 'big' one!
